    AutoSharpen(SerializedProperty, Single)

    Takes a path, and switches Auto/Sharp marked control points based on their angles.

    Declaration
    public static void AutoSharpen(SerializedProperty aPath, float aTolerance = 45F)
    Parameters
    Type Name Description
    UnityEditor.SerializedProperty aPath

    A SerializedProperty pointing to a Path2D object.
    Single aTolerance

    How far can the angle deviate from right angles before it switches? Degrees.
